org.aludratest.util.data.helper

Class DataMarkerCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.aludratest.util.data.helper.DataMarkerCheck

  • public class DataMarkerCheck
extends Object
    Utility class containing frequently-used data marker check related methods. Internally uses AludraTest configuration elements, so must be initialized before use. Framework or caller is responsible for calling init(AludraServiceManager) before invoking one of the utility methods.
    Author:
    falbrech

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(AludraServiceManager serviceManager)
        Initializes the utility class.
        Parameters:
        serviceManager - Service Manager to use to retrieve required AludraTest objects, e.g. configuration.

      • isNull

        public static boolean isNull(String string)
        Checks if the given string is "logically" null, i.e. one of the following is true:
        • The string reference is null
        • The string is empty
        • The string equals the configured NULL marker (default: <NULL>)
        Parameters:
        string - String to check
        Returns:
        true if the string is logically null, false otherwise.

      • convertIfEmpty

        public static String convertIfEmpty(String string)
        Returns an empty string, if the given string is null, empty, or matches the configured EMPTY marker (default: <EMPTY>).
        Parameters:
        string - String to convert to empty String, or return unchanged if not empty.
        Returns:
        An empty string, or the unchanged string.

      • convertIfEmpty

        public static String[] convertIfEmpty(String[] strings)
        Converts each string in the given array to an empty string, if it is null, empty, or matches the configured EMPTY marker (default: <EMPTY>).
        The original array is modified and returned.
        Parameters:
        strings - Array to convert empty elements of.
        Returns:
        The same array object, with "logically" empty strings converted to empty strings.

      • getNumericTolerance

        public static double getNumericTolerance()
        Returns the configured numeric tolerance for number comparisons (e.g. by Validators).
        Returns:
        The configured numeric tolerance for number comparisons (e.g. by Validators).
